body.p:
St Louis Mo. March 5. 1862
To His Excellency
The Governor of Kentucky -- Sir

I respectfully solicit a renewal of my appointment as Commissioner of Deeds &c for Kentucky in Missouri -- Having exercised the duties of the office for several years, and having frequent applications to act under such Commission I trust that you may find it consistent with your inclination and duty to grant my request.

I am Respectfully
Your obt sv't
Charles H Tillson

Missouri
Comr. of Deeds
St. Louis
App Mar. 7. 1862
Chas. H. Tillson
